name: DiceThroneHeroRandomizer
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: dice throne
des: This is a fan-made skill for Dice Throne that will allow you to randomize Dice Throne heroes across all seasons or from one specified season. For example: "Alexa, Ask Dice Throne to randomize season 1."
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
